title: India gang rape victim’s father: I want the world to know my daughter’s name is Jyoti Singh Pandey
content: Devastated dad tells The Sunday People he hopes revealing her name will give courage to other women who have survived such attacks She is known to the world only as India’s Daughter following her sickening gang rape and murder. But today, with permission of her devastated father, we can reveal her name: Jyoti Singh Pandey….
